forms.enter_deposit_address: Scrivi il tuo indirizzo di acconto...
forms.enter_transaction_secret_key: Enter the secret key of the transaction...

errors.api_error_title: Sorry, there was a problem. Here's what happened:
errors.monero_address: Please enter a valid Monero address.

error.load: Sorry, technical problems. We can't show you any data right now.

home.intro: What would you like to do?
home.para: Monero is a digital payment system focused on confidentiality. This tool allows you to easily browse public activity in the network.

blocks.para: These are newly mined blocks with the latest transactions.
blocks.block_size_graph_info: Block size compared to the median and maximum allowed.

transaction.text: This is a public transaction summary. You can decode address and amount information with the options below.

mempool.title: Queued transactions
mempool.text: These transactions are waiting to be processed and confirmed by the network. This is also known as the mempool.

form.title: Check if a deposit was received
form.text: Verify that a transaction included a deposit to a specific address, and see if has been confirmed by the network.

result.title: Deposit confirmed
result.text: This is a confirmation that a deposit was made. You can share this link with others as proof.

form.title: Get a transaction receipt
form.text: Here you can prove that you sent Monero to a specific address. View guide.

result.title: Transaction confirmed
result.text: This is a receipt that a transaction has been sent. You can share this link with others as proof.

network_info.title: Informazioni sulla rete
network_info.text: Statistiche sullo stato corrente della rete Monero.

project_info.title: Project info
project_info.text: This explorer is developed and designed by GBKS. Say hi on Twitter for feedback, ideas, etc. Typically I use analytics tools to understand how people use websites, but since Monero is about privacy, there are no tracking services running. So you'll just have to let me know directly about improvements you'd like to see.

data.title: Data
data.text: All data is loaded from xmrchain.net which runs on the Onion Monero Blockchain Explorer. Big thanks to all the contributors.
